Reviews.Title: works out of the box
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I've read mixed reviews about this product but after fussing with 3 NVR sets and 2 additional cameras. Setup and maintenance (minimal) now is a snap. It starts with initial setup and changing the Gateways and IPs properly and setting up the wifi only after setting up through ethernet first.

ProductInfo.Features:
Zmodo ZMD-ISV-BFS23NM CCTV Wireless
80ft IR
Weatherproof
IP Wi-Fi
Surveillance Camera
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo Wireless Security Camera System Network 80ft IR Weatherproof IP Wi-Fi CCTV Surveillance Camera
